Headline: #75 74th-75th Temporary Reroute at 75th/Paxton
ShortDescription: 75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted via 75th, Jeffrey, 76th, Yates and 75th due to, street blockage near 75th/Paxton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#75 74th-75th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 75th, Jeffrey, 76th, Yates and 75th due to, street blockage near 75th/Paxton.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Westbound Reroute near Grand/Cicero
ShortDescription: WB 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Cicero and Grand: due to, street blockage near Grand/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Cicero and Grand, due to, street blockage near Grand/Cicero.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Monroe
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via: Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson, Pulaski, due to, street blockage, near Pulaski/Monroe.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: Pulaski, Madison, Hamlin, Jackson, and Pulaski, due to, street blockage, near Pulaski/Monroe.

Allow extra travel time.
